data.actual_result: The links or mentions resolve to either plain text nicks or the actual ID of a link.
data.expected_result: The notification resolves the link or mention properly.
data.short_description: Channel links and mentions do not fully resolve in push notifications
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Push notifications in a server. - Get a message in that server which contains a discord link or mention. - Observe the notification.
